main event: Two witnesses observed an unidentified flying object over Jewfish Creek, Florida, on September 12, 1967, for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to glide and subtly turn without blinking,One witness described the object as disc-shaped and glowing white,The object faded away at the end of the observation,The witnesses reported no sound emanating from the object,The object was estimated to be about 40-50 feet in diameter and hovered approximately 1,000 feet off the ground.
witness description: One witness was a delivery truck driver and radio and TV repairman; the other was a housewife.
